contents.text: Thank you for calling Marketo in the Peninsula, where we empower marketers to master the art and science of digital marketing.
For product demonstrations and sales inquiries, press 1.
To schedule a personalized demo of our marketing automation platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a Marketo product specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a personalized demo of your marketing automation platform.
I want to schedule a personalized walkthrough of Marketo for my veteran-run nonprofit’s email automation.
Schedule a deep-dive demo on Marketo’s automation API and workflow builder with a product specialist.
I’m not very tech-savvy and would like someone to guide me step-by-step through a demo of your marketing automation platform, please.
I want to book a personalized demonstration of Marketo’s automation features for my physics lab’s newsletter.

contents.text: For pricing information and subscription plans, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team for pricing details.

navigationGoals: I'd like detailed pricing and subscription plan information.
I need detailed pricing information for monthly and annual plans for my small veteran-owned business.
Get a breakdown of subscription tiers, feature limits, and API call quotas for enterprise licensing.
Please explain your subscription plans and fees in simple terms so I can choose the right one.
I need detailed subscription pricing information to see if Marketo fits within my student grant budget.

contents.text: For customer support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I'm having a technical issue with my account integration and need troubleshooting assistance.
I need help troubleshooting why my automated email triggers aren’t firing in Marketo.
Troubleshoot my REST API integration—I'm encountering OAuth token refresh and 401 errors.
I’m having trouble logging into my account; could someone walk me through fixing this access issue?
I'm having trouble with my email campaign setup and need technical assistance to resolve the issue.

contents.text: For billing, renewals, or account updates, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our account services department.

navigationGoals: I need to update my billing information and renew my subscription.
I want to update my payment method and renew my annual Marketo subscription.
Update my payment method and renew our enterprise subscription for seamless service continuity.
I need to update my credit card on file and renew my subscription, and would appreciate help through each step.
I'd like to update my payment details and confirm renewal options for my account.
